value:
Noble of Chalphy, crusader of
Grannvale... Clothing can impart
more than one truth.

Just as the people of Isaach recognize
Shannan, those who knew my father
see significance of these clothes.

As child of a father branded a traitor,
I want to live up to the expectations
of those who have supported me.

If it is my fate to fight as a crusader,
if that is my destiny, so be it. I will
do as the gods wish of me.

My father was loved and trusted
by many. I hope to be like him
in that way.

I am Seliph. I have heard you are
quite a capable tactician, according
to $Nf.
Father, Mother... Watch over me.

The light of divine Tyrfing shall judge
the darkness of this world!

Light is always with us, so long as it
is never forgotten...

I will do my best to live up to the
expectations you have of me.

I am Seliph, crusader of Grannvale.
I wear these clothes to celebrate my
fatherâ€”a great man indeed.

According to scripture, Naga and
eleven other gods descended from
the heavens...$k$pLewyn once told me of how the 12
crusaders made their pact with those
gods at the Tower of Dahna.$k$pMy world had known much chaos.
When it was learned that a dragon
was behind it all, they took a stand.$k$pThe gods themselves let flow their
blood from their hands, and that
power flowed into the crusaders.$k$pIn that way, the crusaders gained
a dragon's power so as to set the
world as it should be.$k$pThe gods, it seems, were themselves
an ancient dragon tribe.$k$pI have heard similar stories from
other worlds, and I can't help but
wonder...$k$pIf we know of so many other worlds,
we can assume those worlds are
shaped by the same mistakes.$k$pBeing here, in this world, the thought
was nearly unavoidable.$k$pThat is why I believe we who come
together across worlds should help
create a new future for each other.
Like my father...
I shall protect all!
Forward!
We go together!
Do I still not measure up?
I am Seliph. I wear the same garb as my honored father, Sigurd.
*startled* You still manage to sneak up on me.
I have always felt someone calling to me.
Dressed as my father? Nothing could honor me more.
I think that Julia will also be delighted by this outfit.
Father, Mother... Please watch over me.
With all my heart, I wish to protect you and the world you hold dear.
Of course.
As ordered.
Together.
